skills.name: Thirst for Battle (激戦への渇求)
text: Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.
On [Secondary Battery Activation], increases [Main Battery] damage by 50% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Torpedo Interceptor (魚雷邀撃者)
text:
If a friendly ship is hit by a [Torpedo Salvo], and if Maryland has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, activate this skill: 
Maryland takes all torpedo damage during that salvo. Can only proc once per battle.
At the end of [Battle], repair 50% of self HP.
